definition: water from a mountain/mountains and rivers/scenery/landscape
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
shanshui poetry, genre of Classical Chinese poetry
blue-and-green landscape (genre of landscape painting originating in the Tang dynasty, in which blues and greens predominate)

sentences.english: Hu said China and Mongolia are friendly neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛说，中蒙两国是山水相连的友好邻邦。

sentences.english: The third chapter is mainly about the establishment of urban landscapes, artistic language.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，主要是谈都市山水画艺术语言的建立。

sentences.english: I graduated from Guilin Institute, majoring in the professional practice of international trade.
sentences.chinese: 我毕业于桂林山水学院，主修的是国际贸易实务专业。

sentences.english: Zhengzhen made a lot of unique changes in the art manifestation of his poem.
sentences.chinese: 郑珍山水诗在艺术表现上颇多独创之处。

sentences.english: Inside walls painted figures have landscape murals , painted exquisite skills.
sentences.chinese: 殿内四壁绘有人物山水壁画，绘技精湛。

sentences.english: Xuancheng's unique landscape on the city of temperament.
sentences.chinese: 就宣城独特的山水城市气质。

sentences.english: Underglaze black color mountain and water square vese.
This is the value and standing of Jiang yan's poems in the history of poems.
sentences.chinese: 江淹山水诗在诗歌发展史上的地位和价值于此可见。

sentences.english: Unaccustomed to city life, Susan pined for her native hills and streams.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊过不惯城市生活，非常想念她家乡的山山水水。

sentences.english: Changning shows pastoral scenery and human landscape.
sentences.chinese: 展示了昌宁的山水田园风光及人文风貌。

sentences.english: Jiao's masterpieces mainly are Chinese landscape paintings, especially are ones about Songshan Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 作品以中国山水画为主，尤以画嵩山见长。

sentences.english: The drawer is famous for his landscape painting.
sentences.chinese: 这位画家以其山水画著称。

sentences.english: But the feeling aroused by the scenery cannot be described even by the poet.
sentences.chinese: 连诗人都无法形容的却是那山水间勾人心魂的气息。

sentences.english: Wangwei was a famous pastoral poet of landscape.
sentences.chinese: 王维是盛唐时期著名的山水田园诗人。

sentences.english: In 1992, he held in The China Academy of Art landscape paintings.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，他在中国美术学院举办山水画展。

sentences.english: Mount Langya, which stands on the southwest outskirts of Chuzhou in Anhui Province, is well known for its scenic charm.
sentences.chinese: 安徽省滁州市西南郊的琅玡山，向以山水醉人著称。

definition: poetry and pictorial art/work of art combining pictures and poetry
lit. green hills and clear waters/pleasant country scene (idiom)
freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style
blue-and-green landscape (genre of landscape painting originating in the Tang dynasty, in which blues and greens predominate)
patchwork of waterways, esp. in Jiangsu/same as 江南水鄉|江南水乡[Jiang1 nan2 shui3 xiang1]
